mapper.insert: insert into pdm_download_statistics_analysis_info (product_name, product_id, product_type, download_status, download_time, size, download_user) values (#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select product_name, product_id, product_type, download_status, download_time, size, download_user from pdm_download_statistics_analysis_info
